page.title: 20HIRE FIRM & CREDITS
page.content:
The{Hire Firm}is situated on the A38 north of the M5 motorway.There are other depots in Swindon and Wiltshire. Twenty people, both men and women,are employed there. To work there you would be expected to be a{qualified {engineer}and could expect, in return, to earn Â£10,000 per year, exclusive of overtime. There are about{100 trucks {for hire}and you would expect to pay between Â£70 to Â£80 per week for an average size truck.
************************************** { { }Credits : Staff & Pupils at { { Patchway High School}and{ { {Almondsbury Church}of{England School
